comments:
Version: 3.2.0
Build id: I20060309-1000

When selecting an extension point from the add extension wizard a null pointer exception is thrown.  This only seens to be a problem for extension points that are defined in your workspace.  I think this bug may have shown up after M5a.

1. Create a new plugin project
2. Add an extension point to the plugin
3. Open the add extension wizrd for the plugin
4. Select your extension point
5. Observe the follwing exception

java.lang.NullPointerException
